titlestmt.titleproper: Association for Research and Enlightenment Collection
titlestmt.author: Jessica Newell

controlnote.p: Approximately 50 linear feet remain in process, including A.R.E. Press books, audio-visual materials, and management records.

maintenanceevent.eventdescription: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday May 7, 2021 at 15:07

did.unittitle: Association for Research and Enlightenment Collection

corpname.part: The Association for Research and Enlightenment (1931-present)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of administrative records, publications, research data, and audio-visual materials that document the development and activities of the Association for Research and Enlightenment in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item,] [date (if known)], Association for Research and Enlightenment Collection, Coll. 14, box_, folder_, The Edgar Cayce Foundation, Virginia Beach, Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in 8 series: 1. A.R.E. Clinic. 2. Management files, 1931-2019. 3. Prayer Services. 4. Publications, 1931-2019. 5. Regional activities. 6. Research. 7. Study Groups, 1932-2011. 8. Audiovisual materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research use.
Unpublished manuscripts are protected by copyright. Permission to publish, quote, or reproduce must be secured from the repository and the copyright holder.
Permission from the E.C.F. must be approved to view administrative records.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: A.R.E. Press books located in Special Collections section of E.C.F. Archival Storage.
